comments:
Follow the instructions below to reproduce the problem:

- Create a new TPTP JUnit test case
- Open the testsuite file
- In the overview pane, uncheck "Implement Test Behvior as Code" 
- Notice that the Behavior pane goes away
- One would assume that rechecking this option will bring back the Behavior pane. Check this option again, notice that the behavior pane doesn't come back.  In fact it'll never come back no matter how many times you click on that option.

The following exception gets recorded in the log file:


!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2006-04-07 10:26:07.984
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-04-07 10:26:07.984
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.editor.form.util.EObjectTreeSection$1.run(EObjectTreeSection.java:281)

Fix

Fix ready (see attachment). The fix will be checked in when i3 is open to development.
